message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at $120. I think you'll find it's a steal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the quality of this product is unmatched. I can't go as low as $95, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $107. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
